feats.name: Actor
feats.desc: +1 in Cha., advantage on Deception and Performance checks, mimic the speech of a person or the sounds made by a creature.

feats.name: Alert
feats.desc: +5 to initiative, you can't be surprised, and creatures you don't see don't gain advantage on attack roll against you.

feats.name: Artificer Initiate
feats.desc: You learn one cantrip and one 1st-level artificier spell (cast without slot), proficiency with one type of artisan's tools.

feats.name: Athlete
feats.desc: +1 in Str. or Dex., you stand up and climb more quickly, and you can jump with only a 5-ft run.

feats.name: Bountiful Luck
feats.desc: You can let an ally within 30 ft of you to reroll a 1 on a d20.

feats.name: Charger
feats.desc: As part of the Dash action you can make a melee attack with a +5 bonus if you move at least 10 ft before.

feats.name: Chef
feats.desc: +1 in Con. or Wis., proficiency with cook's utensils and cook special food to regain hp.

feats.name: Crossbow Expert
feats.desc: You ignore the loading property of crossbows and don't have disadvantage for being in contact with a creature when you shoot.

feats.name: Crusher
feats.desc: +1 in Str. or Con., 5 ft extra move when you hit (bludgeoning) and attacks with advantage after a critical hit.

feats.name: Defensive Duelist
feats.desc: You can add your proficiency bonus to your AC if you are wielding a finesse weapon, in reaction to a melee attack.

feats.name: Dragon Fear
feats.desc: +1 in Str., Con., or Cha. and your Breath Weapon can frighten instead of inflicting damages.

feats.name: Dragon Hide
feats.desc: +1 in Str., Con., or Cha., your AC becomes 13+Dex. modifier and your retractable claws deal 1d4+Str. modifier slashing damage.

feats.name: Drow High Magic
feats.desc: You can cast the detect magic spell (at will) and the levitate and dispel magic spells (1/long rest).

feats.name: Dual Wielder
feats.desc: +1 to CA if you're wielding a melee weapon in each hand, two-weapon fighting with non-light weapon, draw two weapons.

feats.name: Dungeon Delver
feats.desc: Alert to the hidden traps and secret doors found in many dungeons, you gain the following benefits: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Intelligence (Investigation) checks made to detect the presence of secret doors. You have advantage on saving throws made to avoid or resist traps. You have resistance to the damage dealt by traps. Traveling at a fast pace doesn't impose the normal âˆ’5 penalty on your passive Wisdom (Perception) score.

feats.name: Durable
feats.desc: Hardy and resilient, you gain the following benefits: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20. When you roll a Hit Die to regain hit points, the minimum number of hit points you regain from the roll equals twice your Constitution modifier (minimum of 2).

feats.name: Dwarf Fortitude
feats.desc: +1 in Con., and you can spend one Hit Die to heal yourself taking the Dodge action.

feats.name: Eldritch Adept
feats.desc: You learn one Eldritch Invocation.

feats.name: Elemental Adept
feats.desc: When you gain this feat, choose one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. Spells you cast ignore resistance to damage of the chosen type. In addition, when you roll damage for a spell you cast that deals damage of that type, you can treat any 1 on a damage die as a 2. You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you do so, you must choose a different damage type.
feats.prerequisite: The ability to cast at least one spell

feats.name: Elven Accuracy
feats.desc: +1 in Dex., Int., Wis., or Cha., and you can reroll one attack roll if you have advantage.

feats.name: Fade Away
feats.desc: +1 in Dex. or Int., and you can use your reaction to become invisible if you take damage.

feats.name: Fey Teleportation
feats.desc: +1 in Int. or Cha., you speak Sylvan, and you can cast the misty step spell (1/short rest).

feats.name: Fey Touched
feats.desc: +1 in Int., Wis., or Cha., and you learn misty step and one 1st-level spell from divination or enchantment school.

feats.name: Fighting Initiate
feats.desc: You learn one Fighting Style option from the fighter class.

feats.name: Flames of Phlegethos
feats.desc: +1 in Int. or Cha., reroll any 1 on fire spell damage, and cause flames to wreathe you if you cast a fire spell.

feats.name: Gift of the Chromatic Dragon
feats.desc: Extra 1d4 acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage for 1 min (bonus action). Resistance to 1 of these damages (reaction).

feats.name: Gift of the Gem Dragon
feats.desc: +1 in Int., Wis., or Cha., Strength saving throw or 2d8 force damage and pushed away 10 ft in reaction to an attack (PB/day).

feats.name: Gift of the Metallic Dragon
feats.desc: You can cast cure wounds (1/long rest). As a reaction to an attack, can manifest wings to get +PB to your AC (PB/day).

feats.name: Grappler
feats.desc: You've developed the skills necessary to hold your own in close-quarters grappling. You gain the following benefits: You have advantage on attack rolls against a creature you are grappling. You can use your action to try to pin a creature grappled by you. To do so, make another grapple check. If you succeed, you and the creature are both restrained until the grapple ends.

feats.name: Great Weapon Master
feats.desc: Extra attack after a melee critical hit and you can choose to take -5 to attack roll to add +10 to damage with an heavy weapon.

feats.name: Gunner
feats.desc: +1 in Dex., proficiency with firearms, ignore loading property of firearms and no disadvantage to attacks within 5 ft.

feats.name: Healer
feats.desc: You can stabilize a creature and restore it to 1 hp, or restore [1d6+4+its number of Hit Dice] hp to it.

feats.name: Heavily Armored
feats.desc: +1 in Str. and you gain proficiency with heavy armor.

feats.name: Heavy Armor Master
feats.desc: +1 in Str. and bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage are reduced by 3 if you are wearing an heavy armor.

feats.name: Infernal Constitution
feats.desc: +1 in Con., resistance to cold and poison damage, and you have advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

feats.name: Inspiring Leader
feats.desc: Up to 6 creatures within 30 ft of you can gain temporary hp equal to your level + your Cha. modifier.

feats.name: Keen Mind
feats.desc: +1 in Int., you know which way is north, when is the next sunrise/sunset, and recall any events within the past month.

feats.name: Lightly Armored
feats.desc: +1 in Str. or Dex. and you gain profociency with light armor.

feats.name: Lucky
feats.desc: You can reroll one d20 or force to reroll an attack roll against you (3/long rest).

feats.name: Mage Slayer
feats.desc: You can use a reaction to make a melee attack against a spellcaster and advantage on saving throws against spell within 5 ft.

feats.name: Magic Initiater
feats.desc: You learn two cantrips and one 1st-level spell from one class.

feats.name: Martial Adept
feats.desc: You learn two cantrips and one 1st-level spell from one class.

feats.name: Medium Armor Master
feats.desc: No disadvantage to Stealth checks wearing medium armor and Dexterity bonus max to +3 instead of +2.

feats.name: Metamagic Adept
feats.desc: You learn two metamagic options and gain 2 sorcery points.

feats.name: Mobile
feats.desc: Your speed increase by 10 ft, you can Dash on difficult terrain without malus, and don't provoke opportunity attacks in melee.

feats.name: Moderately Armored
feats.desc: +1 in Str. or Dex. and you gain proficiency with medium armor and shields.

feats.name: Mounted Combatant
feats.desc: Advantage on melee attacks against unmounted creature and force an attack to target you instead of your mount.

feats.name: Observant
feats.desc: +1 in Int. or Wis., you can read on lips, and you have a +5 bonus in passive Perception and passive Investigation.

feats.name: Orcish Fury
feats.desc: +1 in Str. or Con., add one of the weapon's damage dice, and use a reaction to attack after using Relentless Endurance.

feats.name: Piercer
feats.desc: +1 in Str. or Dex., reroll one damage dice when you hit (piercing) and one additional damage dice in case of critical hit.

feats.name: Poisoner
feats.desc: Proficiency with poisoner's kit, apply as a bonus action and your attacks ignore resistance to poison damage.

feats.name: Polearm Master
feats.desc: You can make an extra attack with a polearm weapon, and make an opportunity attack if a creature enter your reach.

feats.name: Prodigy
feats.desc: You gain proficiency with one skill, one tool or one language, and you gain expertise with one skill.

feats.name: Resilient
feats.desc: +1 in one ability and you gain proficiency in saving throws using this ability.

feats.name: Ritual Caster
feats.desc: You have a ritual book with two 1-st level ritual spells from one class and you can later on add other ritual spells you found.

feats.name: Savage Attacker
feats.desc: You can reroll melee weapon attack damage once per turn.

feats.name: Second Chance
feats.desc: +1 in Dex., Con., or Cha., and you can force a creature to reroll its attack roll if it hits you.

feats.name: Sentinel
feats.desc: A successful OA reduce creature's speed to 0 for this turn and possibility to make an OA even if the ennemy take Disengage.

feats.name: Shadow Touched
feats.desc: +1 in Int., Wis., or Cha., and you learn invisibility and one 1st-level spell from illusion or necromancy school.

feats.name: Sharpshooter
feats.desc: Your ranged attacks ignore some cover, no disavantage at long range, and possibility to take -5 to hit for +10 on ranged damage.

feats.name: Shield Master
feats.desc: Attack also allows to shove, shield bonus to Dex. saving throws againts spells, and no 1/2 damage on successful saving throw.

feats.name: Skill Expert
feats.desc: +1 in one ability, proficiency in one skill and expertise in one other in which you have proficiency.

feats.name: Skilled
feats.desc: You gain proliciency with three skills or tools.

feats.name: Skulker
feats.desc: Ranged weapon attack doesn't reveal your position and possibility to hide in a lighlly obscured area.

feats.name: Slasher
feats.desc: +1 in Str. or Dex., reduce target's speed by 10 ft when you hit (slashing) and target has disadvantage on attacks rolls.

feats.name: Spell Sniper
feats.desc: Offensive spell's range doubled, these spells ignore some cover, and you learn one offensive cantrip.
feats.prerequisite: The ability to cast at least one spell

feats.name: Squat Nimbleness
feats.desc: +1 in Str. or Dex., your speed increases by 5 ft, and proficiency and advantage to escape with Acrobatics or Athletics checks.

feats.name: Tavern Brawler
feats.desc: Accustomed to rough-and-tumble fighting using whatever weapons happen to be at hand, you gain the following benefits: Increase your Strength or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20. You are proficient with improvised weapons and unarmed strikes. Your unarmed strike uses a d4 for damage. When you hit a creature with an unarmed strike or an improvised weapon on your turn, you can use a bonus action to attempt to grapple the target.

feats.name: Telekinetic
feats.desc: +1 in Int., Wis., or Cha., you learn mage hand and you can try to telekinetically shove one creature (5 ft).

feats.name: Tough
feats.desc: Your hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to twice your level then by +2 at each level.

feats.name: War Caster
feats.desc: You have advantage on saving throws to maintain concentration and you can cast some spells as part of an OA with a reaction.
feats.prerequisite: The ability to cast at least one spell

feats.name: Weapon Master
feats.desc: +1 in Str. or Dex. and you gain proficiency with four weapons.

feats.name: Wood Elf Magic
feats.desc: You learn one druid cantrip and can cast the longstrider and pass without trace spells (1/long rest).
